titles: Buxom Joan of Lymas's love to a jolly sailer: or, The maiden's choice: being love for love again. To an excellent new play-house tune.
author: Congreve, William, 1670-1729.
publisher: printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, at the Golden-ball, in Pye-corner.,
notes: Attributed to William Congreve by Wing.
